me-3 nawilze, romelTa Tanaxmad, sakasacio saCivari

m gamoiyena kanoni, 


romelic ar unda gamoeyenebina. saproceso samarTlis 


normebis darRveva 


mxolod maSin SeiZleba gaxdes gadawyvetilebis gauqme


bis safuZveli, Tu 


am darRvevis Sedegad saqmeze araswori gadawyvetileb


a iqna gamotanili.
